org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks

Class JacocoCoverageVerification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractTask
      • org.gradle.api.DefaultTask
        • org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoBase
          • org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoReportBase
            • org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoCoverageVerification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>, org.gradle.api.internal.DynamicObjectAware, org.gradle.api.internal.TaskInternal, ExtensionAware, Task, org.gradle.util.Configurable<Task>

    @Incubating
public class JacocoCoverageVerification
extends JacocoReportBase
    Task for verifying code coverage metrics. Fails the task if violations are detected based on specified rules.

    Requires JaCoCo version >= 0.6.3.

    Since:
    3.4
